extension.summary: Confluence skin by Jezz_X. (Kodi's default skin)
extension.description: Confluence is the default skin for Kodi 14.0 and above. It is a combination of concepts from many popular skins, and attempts to embrace and integrate their good ideas into a skin that should be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
extension.disclaimer: Confluence is the default skin for Kodi, removing it may cause issues
